name: Angst
description:
ANGST is a survival and psychological horror game set in a giant remote prison in Alaska

Enter the Cube and experience survival horror like never before with horrifying environments, storylines, and characters.

Synopsis :


Logan Grey, a Private detective is sent to investigate a strange place called the Cube. A Government's "ecological" project which aims to provide a solution to Global pollution, Crime, and overcrowding. Every footage of this place is proved to be fake and the administration is operating in secrecy.

Once inside, He will discover the horrifying truth of why nobody ever saw what was happening. Stuck between his growing illness and the various dangers of the cube, Logan has to beat his demons and escape.

Features :

  • Psychological horror experience: Fight your demons and free yourself from your own jail.
  • Survival horror experience: You can run, hide, and try to defend yourself but be careful, they aren't scared of you.
  • Relentless and Unpredictable Enemies: Your enemies will do anything they can to kill you. They will always catch up to you when you less expect it using their environment as a weapon.
  • Immersion: Coupled with the difficulty, Your character is heavy and hard to control. Not much HUD, Incredible sound design, realistic weapons and characters]

Warning :


Angst contains disturbing images, intense violence, gore, and strong language.
